description.en: Kunimi Hiro and his best friend Hideo were baseball wonders… Until Hiro found out his arm was permanently damaged, rendering him unable to play anymore. A frustrated Hiro goes through the trouble of specifically finding a high school with no baseball team… Only to later on find out the doctor who examined him was a quack and his arm is perfectly fine. Hiro is quick to reinstate his dream: Creating a baseball team for his school and getting to face off against Hideo in the Koshien… The number one premier league for high school baseball.

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.
description.ja: “最強”を求めた者が必ず行きつく人物。　その名は「TSUYOSHI」。　「最強」ということ以外、謎に包まれた彼は一体何者なのか――！？

description.en: After her parents died, Sami gave up her life of fortune to live independently, doing odd jobs to make ends meet. When she starts to get involved with two of the most popular boys at her high school, Sami faces twists and turns -- Chan is her neighbor, and Pyojun makes her have conflicted feelings. Things get more complicated when she finds out that Chan has feelings for Pyojun as well! With her mom’s only keepsake in hand to keep her feet on the ground, Sami navigates obstacles that she wasn’t prepared for -- and aren’t even in her budget!

The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
In a world ravaged by war and conflict, Hero Raid Freeden and Sage Eluria Caldwin clashed time and time again over fifty long years as the strongest soldiers of their respective nations. However, their long-standing rivalry came to an inevitable yet bitter end with Eluria’s sudden death. A thousand years later, Raid finds he has been reincarnated—and so has Eluria! The world may now be at peace, but the two have an unsettled rivalry between them and the mystery of their reincarnation looms ominously over their heads. There’s so much that needs to be done, so they decide to...get engaged and attend the Royal Institute of Magic together?!

---
**Links** 

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-and-the-sage-reincarnated-and-engaged)
* [NovelUpdates](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/reincarnated-%e2%80%a2-the-hero-marries-the-sage-after-becoming-engaged-to-a-former-rival-we-became-the-strongest-couple/) (Temporary, Bug cuts this url when saved in the NU field)
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

altTitles.ja: 無口な吉田くん

title.en: Hikaeme ni Itte mo, Kore wa Ai

altTitles.ja: ひかえめに言っても、これは愛

description.en:
Spare eraser? Check. Extra folding umbrella? Check. First aid kit? Check. Cool and collected high school student Risa Amakawa has something in her heavy bag for every situation and the last thing she needs or knows how to ask for is anyone’s help. When she saves a beat-up delinquent in the park one rainy evening, she refuses any sort of repayment.

But it turns out that saving the notorious Zen Ohira buys her the attention of some unsavory characters. As Zen keeps swooping in to help her out of one pickle after another, her feelings about relying on anyone but herself and her feelings toward Zen slowly begin to change. A new romcom from the author of Lovesick Ellie.

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

description.en:
The mom characters who appear in the game are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why… Why does such a cute mom have to die?!“ Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of MamaFan on a certain day. …However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who’s got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who’s crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!

Expecting rejection, they are instead met with love and acceptance from their father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers them the family leadership.

description.en: The new teachers at high school student Touma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akamine Shuri and Shirasawa Kohaku are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again... "Hey, can I kiss you?" "Do you hate sleeping with me?" They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make an already established fact with Tohru before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Tohru and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...? This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!
description.ja: 高校生・虹野透真の学校に新任教師としてやって来たのは、かつて彼を振った元カノたちだった！　しかもその教師、赤峰朱里と白沢琥珀の二人はどっちも透真に未練がありまくり。思いがけない再会に喜ぶ透真だったが……。「ねえ、チューしていい？」「私との添い寝、嫌いになったの？」卒業までに透真と既成事実を作ってしまおうと、ふたり同時に抜け駆けスタート。しかも透真と同じマンションに住み、「通い妻」としてこっそり愛を育もうとしてきて――!?　全力で誘惑してくる元カノ教師との、甘々ラブコメディ！！
description.es-la: Las nuevas profesoras del estudiante Touma Nijino son sus ex novias que le dejaron en el pasado. Además, tanto Akamine Shuri como Shirasawa Kohaku siguen enamoradas de él. Se alegra de volver a verlas, pero.... No se alegra de volver a verlas... "Oye, ¿puedo besarte?" "¿Odias acostarte conmigo?" Empiezan a competir entre ellas al mismo tiempo, tratando de concretar un hecho ya establecido con Tohru antes de la graduación. Además, viven en el mismo complejo de apartamentos que Tohru e intentan alimentar su amor en secreto como una "esposa viajera"...? ¡Esta es una dulce comedia de amor con ex-novias profesoras que te tientan con todo lo que tienen!

A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en: Su, born in prison, has always wanted to see the "crow" from what her mother told her. On the day when she was about to be secretly executed, Gill, the artificial intelligence, was thrown into prison for a test run. She compasses everything from the outside world in her database. Su developed special feelings for Gill, although she didn't care that the words Gill spoke were programmed or from her own consciousness. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell, the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could bring her solace.

title.en: The Duke's Daughter Is Going on Strike

altTitles.en: The Princess Is Going on Strike From Now on
The Princess Is Going on Strike

description.en:
Aeryl Frey Brixia had lived all her life hiding behind a mask.

She was shunned by everyone including the father she craved affection from because of the ugly mark on her face that branded her a monster.

At the end of her miserable life, she was falsely accused of selling military weapons to the enemy nation and sentenced to execution…

The blade of the guillotine dropped and everything went black.

The next time she opened her eyes, she was in her room again as a young girl.

This time, she was determined things will be different. She will no longer be a puppet. She will no longer be manipulated.

And the first thing for her to do is to cooperate with the two officers leading the investigation against her father

title.en: Sore wa Rei no Shiwaza desu

altTitles.en: It's the work of the Ghost

altTitles.ja: それは霊のしわざです

altTitles.th: รักนี้ผีจัดให้

description.en: My name is Torii Nozomu, a plain introvert. Suddenly a new transfer student, Kirishima Kyoko, sits next to me. She's cute, kind, and for some reason she proactively talks to me, even though I'm a nerd! A true saint. Yet I want to get involved with her as little as possible because she's haunted by a "ghost" that only I can see! She's a little naughty, extremely pure and, in some cases, horrifying! Will I ever find a way to handle her?
description.fr: Je m'appelle Torii Nozomi. Un jour, une nouvelle fille est arrivée dans ma classe. Elle est très jolie, mais le problème c'est qu'elle est suivie par un fantôme (très taquin) que je suis le seul à voir !
description.ja: 地味で目立たない陰キャな僕、鳥居望(とりいのぞむ)。そんな僕の隣に席に転校生の霧島京子(きりしまきょうこ）ちゃんがやってきた。可愛くて優しくて、なぜか陰キャな僕にも積極的に話しかけてくれる「ぐう聖」な京子ちゃん！…だけど僕はなるべく彼女にかかわりたくない。だって、彼女には僕にだけ見える“霊”が憑いてるんだ！！！！――ちょっとエッチで、とびきりピュアで、ところによりホラー！？

altTitles.ja: ミミクリー・ガールズ

description.en:
The year is 2041. It has been several years since the development of Artificial Body technology, commonly known as "Mimic." Captain Chris Armstrong, after suffering a serious injury from an unexpected incident during a military operation, undergoes mimic surgery and returns to the frontlines... or at least, that was the plan. After the surgery, there was something strange about his body. His reflection that he saw in the mirror had soft white skin, complimented by silky hair——it was a beautiful girl!?!!?

Amidst the flames of war writhing with conspiracy and resentment, a makeshift team of four girl-type mimics was formed. Their name: Mimicry Girls.

Shooting, CQC, infiltration. A mission was given to these girls that were specialists in all fields. That is, to escort the president's daughter from the international criminal organization "Val Verde" that is out for her life. After a cool tea party is the start of a cute operation! Taking on the form of girls, they face off against the world's greatest evils!
description.ja:
第28回電撃小説大賞《銀賞》受賞作をキャラクターデザインも手掛けるあさなや先生が衝撃のコミカライズ!! 2041年。人工素体技術――通称《ミミック》が開発された世界。作戦中、重傷を負ってしまったクリス・アームストロング大尉は素体化手術を受け、なんと美少女の姿に!?

謀略と怨嗟が蠢く戦火の陰で突如結成された、4体の少女型素体からなる即席部隊。その名は――『ミミクリー・ガールズ』。射撃、格闘、潜入。あらゆる分野のスペシャリストである彼女たちに与えられたミッション。それは謎の国際犯罪組織"バル・ベルデ"に狙われた大統領の娘の護衛だった。クールなティータイムの後は、キュートに作戦開始!少女に擬態し、世界の巨悪に立ち向かえ――!

description.en:
"Wanting to forget something that had happened, Hikaru jumps off a building. Right before he hits the ground, a monster in a human shape breaks his fall. The creature's frightful appearance makes Hikaru cower, but as it continues to stay by his side without saying a word, Hikaru starts to question what its motives are...

A deeply moving BL that resonates with the heartbreaking feeling of being left behind."

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !
description.ja: 樹木暦1294年。音が“見える”ラッパ手の少年・リュカは傭兵団に属しながらも戦争を嫌い、楽師になる事を夢見ていた。しかしある日、「枝憑き」と呼ばれる力が発現し、彼の運命は大きく動き出す――。

altTitles.ja: アルケミスト
アルケミスト　夢を旅した少年

description.en: Santiago, a shepherd, believes in his dream that there is a hidden treasure waiting for him, and crosses the African desert to reach the pyramids. Through the alchemist's guidance and various encounters on his journey, he learns wisdom about life.
description.ja: 羊飼いのサンチャゴは、彼を待つ宝が隠されているという夢を信じ、アフリカの砂漠を越えピラミッドを目指す。錬金術師の導きと旅のさまざまな出会いのなかで、人生の知恵を学んで行く。
description.pt-br: Santiago, um jovem pastor da Andaluzia, parte rumo ao Egito em busca de um tesouro escondido entre as Pirâmides. O que ele não sabe é que sua jornada o levará a riquezas muito diferentes – e mais satisfatórias – do que ele estava esperando.

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: 狼の星座

description.en: This manga is partly inspired by the real-life Japanese horse bandit, Hakuro Kohinata, and depicts the tumultuous life of Kensaku Ohinata, who moved to China at a young age, was kidnapped by a group of horse bandits, but rose to prominence among their ranks and eventually grew up to unite a number of them under the name of Xiao Dongyang. Kensaku's adventurous spirit and ambition, as well as his positive, brave personality, can sometimes lead to light-hearted mischief, but as he matures into a young man, he grows to experience bouts of delusion. Regarded as one of Mitsuteru Yokoyama's most realistic and human works, this manga draws inspiration from another real-life Japanese horse bandit: Date Junnosuke, thus vividly depicting the reality of Chinese horse bandits.

altTitles.ja: サキュバスのいる生活

description.en:
In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo.  
  
Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!
description.pt-br:
Em 1950, uma idosa foi brutalmente morta na face de uma Torre do Relógio por sua filha adotiva. Dois anos depois, a Torre do Relógio ficou conhecida como a "Torre Fantasma" e está supostamente assombrada. Através dessas séries de eventos incomuns, um jovem NEET chamado Amano Taichi é atacado por alguém ou algo na mesma Torre do Relógio, e encontra-se preso na face do relógio, pronto pra ser morto da mesma maneira que a idosa foi. Pra sorte de Amano, ele não encontra o mesmo destino. Ele é resgatado por uma pessoa misteriosa que alega se chamar Tetsuo.

Tetsuo está procurando por um tesouro que está  conectado com a Torre Fantasma, e ele quer que Taichi seja seu parceiro. Taichi fica mais convencido sobre a proposta quando sua casa pega fogo e fica sem onde morar, sendo obrigado a depender da caridade de Tetsuo. A aventura vai ser extremamente perigosa, já que os mesmos 'inimigos' quem atacaram Taichi antes parecem que vão tentar algo novamente! Sem mencionar que, Taichi realmente sabe muito pouco sobre seu parceiro, incluindo "seu" verdadeiro sexo!

altTitles.ja: クロザクロ

description.en: Sakurai Mikito is a wimp who is constantly bullied and never fights back, as he doesn't want to hurt others.This all changes when a mysterious sphere enters him - Zakuro. He soon begins to feel different feeling desires to eat… humans. Is he still human, or will he succumb to his desires and fully become a monster?
description.ja:
「他人を傷つけるくらいなら、傷つけられたほうがいい……」

心優しきいじめられっ子、高校生・桜井幹人。彼の体に、ある日突然謎の「種」が入ってしまった。そして幹人は、夢の中で不思議な子供・ザクロに出会う――。夢の中で「強くなりたい」と望んだ幹人だったが、直後から怒りっぽくなり、人が食糧に見えるようになってしまう。――なんと彼は、人を喰う「傀牙（オーガ）」になろうとしていたのだ！！

altTitles.fr: Darren Shan - Le cirque de l'étrange

altTitles.ja: ダレン・シャン

altTitles.en: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant

description.en:
Darren Shan's an ordinary schoolboy, until he and his best friend Steve get tickets to the Cirque Du Freak, a bizarre freak show featuring such arcane performers. In the midst of the ghoulish excitement, true terror raises its head when Steve recognises that one of the performers – Mr Crepsley – is in fact a vampire! That's when the hands of fate changes the lives of them forever!  
  
Based on the english novel series Cirque Du Freak by author Darren Shan.

Kei often gets involved in fights, despite of him being weak and always end up losing. One day, while helping a friend to bring some textbooks to an old building of his school, he and his childhood friend, Tomoe, are attacked by a monster. In order to save his friend, Kei will choose to become a Grave Protector!
description.ru: Томицука Кей – слабак, неудачник и просто коротышка, живущий в одном из маленьких городков Японии. Но все же в этом пареньке что-то есть… И это что-то – чувство справедливости, да такое, которого нету ни у кого из его сверстников. Один раз он отправился в старое здание школы вместе со своей подругой детства. Побродив там немного, Кей попал… попал на кладбище, которое находилось за огромной дверью… И открыв эту дверь, Кей выпустил на свободу 8 монстров . Чтобы спасти свою подружку от одного из таких чудовищ, Кей заключает договор с Цербером. Получив силу, распрощался со своей обычной повседневной жизнью…

title.en: Shiori Experience: My Plain Self and an Odd Old Man

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan

altTitles.ja: SHIORI EXPERIENCE ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~
シオリエクスペリエンス  ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~

altTitles.ru: Shiori Experience: незаурядный Джими и заурядная Я

altTitles.uk: Досвід Шіорі ~Джимі, я і дивний дядько~

description.en:
Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo.  
  
A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt… till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.  
  
A story of a 27-year-old woman on her way to a music legend begins here.
description.ru: История о Шиори, скромной и неуклюжей 27-летней школьной учительнице, которая любит играть на гитаре и общается с призраком Джими Хендрикса.
description.pt-br: Shiori era uma guitarrista em um clube de música no colégio. Mas sua primeira apresentação ao vivo foi frustrada quando seu irmão fugiu de casa deixando um monte de dívidas para se tornar um músico em Tóquio. Uma década depois, Shiori é agora uma professora do ensino médio, levando uma vida monótona e entediante pagando as dívidas... Até ela dar de cara com o fantasma de ninguém menos que um famoso guitarrista chamado Jim-você-sabe-quem. A história de uma mulher de 27 anos de idade, a caminho de uma lenda musical começa aqui.

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?
description.ja: マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

title.en: Your Majesty, Please Spare Me This Time

altTitles.en: Your Majesty, Please Don't Kill Me Again!

altTitles.fr: Votre majesté, ne me tuez pas encore s'il vous-plaît!

description.ar:
بعد مذبحة الإمبراطور الغير عادلة لـعائلتها وموتها البائس، تستيقظ لارييت فيلوس لتجد أنها في جسد نفسها البالغة من العمر 12 عامًا، وضعتنصب عينيها فورًا على هدفٍ واحد: الأقتراب من الإمبراطور روبرت إدغار راسبي فيليلوم و أيضًا أنقاذ عائلتها، خطة لارييت مضمونة باستثناء أمرًاواحد... في جدولها الزمني الحالي، لا يزال الإمبراطور المستقبلي يتنكر كأميرة تدعى لافيرت! بحقيبة واحدة فقط وبعض العملات المعدنية في جيبها،تنطلق إلى العاصمة لتصبح أقرب و اكثر خادمة شرف محبوبة للأميرة، هل تستطيع لارييت إثبات قدرتها على الحفاظ على السر؟ والأهم من ذلك، هلستكون قادرة على الفوز بمحبة روبرت القاسي والسادي؟

---

description.de:
Nach dem ungerechten Massaker des Kaisers an ihrer Familie und ihrem eigenen elenden Tod wacht Laliette Bellua im Körper ihres zwölfjährigen Ichs auf. Sofort setzt sie sich ein einziges Ziel: Sich bei Kaiser Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum einschmeicheln und ihre Familie retten. Laliettes Plan ist kinderleicht, bis auf ein klitzekleines Detail ... In der gegenwärtigen Zeit gibt sich der zukünftige Kaiser noch als Prinzessin Rapertte aus! Mit nur einem einzigen Koffer und etwas Kleingeld macht sie sich auf den Weg in die Hauptstadt, um das liebste und vertrauteste Dienstmädchen der Prinzessin zu werden. Kann Laliette ihr Geschick, ein Geheimnis zu bewahren, beweisen? Und vor allem: Wird sie es schaffen, die Gunst der unbarmherzigen und sadistischen Rapertte zu erlangen?

---

description.en:
Following the emperor's unjust massacre of her family and her own miserable death, Laliette Bellua wakes up to find that she is in the body of her 12-year-old self. She immediately sets her sights on a single goal: suck up to Emperor Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum and save her family. Laliette's plan is foolproof, except for one tiny detail... In her present timeline, the future emperor is still masquerading as a princess named Rapertte! With only a single suitcase and some change in her pocket, she sets out for the capital to become the princess' closest and most beloved attendant. Can Laliette prove her ability to keep a secret? And more importantly, will she be able to win the favor of the cruel and sadistic Rapertte?

---
It was the end of a sunny summer day. In the hands of the tyrant, father, mother, brother and my neck went under the guillotine. And when I opened my eyes, it was my 12th birthday. Before the 13-year-old young Emperor became a brutal tyrant, I had to somehow become a god next to the man.

"I'm your maid of honor, so I'll follow you."

"I don't have much. And I don't own you."

To live and to save my family, I have to be in the eyes of that tyrant who didn't believe in humanity. Only then I can live. But that horrible monster is starting to change.

"I save what I lose in my hands. So don't hurt yourself without my permission."

---

description.fa:
پایان یک روز آفتابی تابستان بود. در دستان ستمگر ، پدر ، مادر ، برادر و گردن من زیر گیوتین رفت. و وقتی چشمانم را باز کردم ، تولد 12 سالگی من بود. قبل از اینکه امپراطور جوان 13 ساله به یک ستمگر بیرحم تبدیل شود ، من مجبور شدم به نوعی در کنار آن مرد باشم. "من کنیز افتخار تو هستم ، بنابراین تو را دنبال خواهم کرد." "من چیز زیادی ندارم. و مالک شما نیستم." برای زندگی و نجات خانواده ام ، باید در چشم آن ظالم باشم که به بشریت اعتقادی نداشت. فقط در این صورت است که می توانم زندگی کنم. اما آن هیولای وحشتناک در حال تغییر است. "من آنچه را که از دست می دهم ذخیره می کنم. بنابراین بدون اجازه من به خودت آسیب نرسان."

description.fr:
Après que l'Empereur a injustement massacré sa famille et qu'elle a perdu la vie, Laliette Bellua se réveille dans son corps d'enfant de douze ans. Aussitôt, elle ne se fixe qu'un objectif: obtenir les bonnes grâces de l'Empereur Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum et ainsi sauver sa famille. Le plan de Laliette est infaillible, à un détail près... À l'époque actuelle, le futur empereur se fait passer pour une princesse nommée Rapertte! Avec un seul bagage et un peu d'argent en poche, elle part pour la capitale afin de devenir la domestique préférée de la princesse. Laliette sera-t-elle en mesure de garder le secret? Et surtout, saura-t-elle gagner les faveurs de la cruelle et sadique Rapertte?

---

description.ko:
햇볕 강한 여름날의 죽음이었다.
열 여덟, 폭군의 손에 아버지와 어머니, 동생, 뒤이어 내 목까지 단두대 위에서 잘려나갔다.

그리고 나는 눈을 떴다.
열 두살의 생일이었다.

열 세살의 어린 황녀(?)가 잔인한 폭군 황제가 되기 전에 나는 어떻게든 저 인간 옆에 붙어 간신이 되어야 했다.

"저도 전하의 시녀니까 전하만을 따르겠어요."
"난 가진 게 별로 없어. 그리고 넌 내 것이 아니야."

살기 위해, 가족을 구하기 위해
인간 불신에 빠진 저 폭군의 눈에 들어야 해.

그래야만 내가 살 수 있어.

그런데 끔찍한 저 괴물이 점점 달라지기 시작한다.

"난 내 손에 쥔 것은 아껴. 그러니까 내 허락없이 네 몸에 상처 내지 마."

---

description.pt:
Por causa do testemunho de meu pai sobre o tirano, meu pescoço foi cortado com a família na guilhotina. Quando acordei eu estava em meu aniversário de doze anos novamente. Para salvar a família, decidi me tornar o segredo do tirano. Então, Vossa Majestade, vamos nos aproximar. Vou fazer o meu melhor com sinceridade, então não me mate de novo! “Porque estou realmente do lado de vossa Majestade? Eu juro!" "Cale-se." “Novamente, eu o amo. Não machuque seu corpo sem minha permissão.”

---

description.ru:
Я умерла в солнечный летний день. Мне было восемнадцать лет. Человек, чьи руки были по локоть в крови, казнил меня и всю мою семью. Я очнулась. Мне снова 12…
Время, когда юный принц ещё не стал жестоким императором-тираном. Мне нужно выжить, находясь рядом с ним. Я стану хитрей.
«Ваше Высочество, я ваша новая горничная, клянусь всегда следовать за вами.»
«Ты не моя вещь.»
Чтобы выжить и спасти свою семью, я должна суметь втереться в доверие к Императору, который утопает в недоверии к людям. Но этот ужасающий человек постепенно начал меняться?
«Я берегу то, что принадлежит мне, и поэтому без моего разрешения не смей вредить себе.»

---

description.vi:
Đó là sự kết thúc của một ngày hè đầy nắng. Dưới bàn tay của bạo chúa, cha, mẹ, anh trai và tôi đã phải chịu máy chém cổ. Và khi tôi mở mắt ra,thì lại là sinh nhật thứ 12 của tôi. Trước khi vị Hoàng đế trẻ 13 tuổi trở thành một bạo chúa tàn bạo, tôi phải nghĩ cách để trở thành một hầu cận bên cạnh người đàn ông đó. "Em là phù dâu của anh, nên anh sẽ phải đi theo em." "Ta không có thứ gì cho em cả.Và ta cũng không coi em là vật sở hữu." Để có thể sống sót và cứu lấy gia đình mình, tôi phải Luôn ở trong tầm mắt của tên bạo chúa không tin vào nhân loại kia. Chỉ khi đó tôi mới có thể sống. Nhưng con quái vật khủng khiếp đó đang bắt đầu thay đổi. "Ta sẽ dành lại những thứ mà ta đã mất trong tay.Vì vậy, xin đừng tự làm tổn thương mình khi chưa được phép của ta”

Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

title.en: Reincarnated into a Villainous Family, But I'm Ignoring the Plot and Going Rogue!

altTitles.ja: 黒幕一家に転生したけど原作無視して独立する

altTitles.en: I Was Reincarnated Into a Villainous Family, But I'll Ignore the Original Story and Live Independently.

description.en: A voluntary banishment declaration from the family, known as a 'mastermind family'! In order to avoid destruction, Yuri decides to live an unconventional slow life in the frontier...!?
description.ja: 黒幕一家と称される実家から、自主的追放宣言！ ユーリは破滅を回避するために、辺境にて規格外のスローライフを送ることに…!?

altTitles.ja: 忍者と殺し屋のふたりぐらし

altTitles.en: A Ninja and an Assassin Living Together

description.en: Many fatalities?! A naive female ninja and a high school assassin live together in an unpredictable way! A naive female ninja who escapes from a ninja village meets a high school girl assassin!? Their life together, which begins by chance, is full of danger (and excitement)...!
description.ja: 忍びの里から抜け出した世間知らずのくノ一が出会ったのは、女子高生の殺し屋!? ひょんなことから始まった共同生活は危険（ドキドキ）がいっぱい…！
description.ru:
Наивная куноити сбегает из своей деревни ниндзя и встречает школьницу-убийцу!
Начинается непредсказуемая совместная жизнь ниндзя и убийцы★.

altTitles.ja: スマザー・ミー

description.en: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!
description.fr: Dans la ville oppressante de Détroit, Akio est vendu par son père et devient un assassin connu sous le nom de Snake. Jour après jour, il se contente d'obéir aux ordres. Mais soudain, lors de sa mission d'assassinat, il rencontre une jeune femme aveugle et trouve un nouveau sens à sa vie.
description.vi: Detroit là thành phố nơi người lớn thống trị mọi thứ. Akio bị bán, trở thành sát thủ với tên gọi là Rắn. Cuộc sống hàng ngày của cậu chỉ là tuân theo mệnh lệnh. Một ngày, cậu gặp một cô gái mù và dần dần tìm ra ý nghĩa mới của cuộc sống...

description.fr:
C'était la première fois de ma vie.
J'ai passé une nuit avec un homme dont je ne connaissais pas le nom...
C'était un coup d'un soir avec mon futur mari.

altTitles.ja: ミッドナイト・セクレタリ

altTitles.zh-hk: 午夜.秘書 / 暗夜的吸血情人

description.en: Kaya thought she had found the perfect job when she became the private secretary of Kyouhei Touma–the director of a tableware company of the same name. Kyouhei is a capable director, but his arrogance and sluttish behavior are almost legendary. Kaya is doing her best to prove that she is capable in her work, but one night, by accident, she discovers his secret… He is a vampire!
description.ru: Кая Сатодзука - милая девушка, комплексующая по поводу своего детского личика, устраивается секретарём в крупную компанию. Её директор - настоящий тиран и Казанова. Но Сатодзука твёрдо решила, что ни за что не отступится от своей цели и станет для него самым лучшим секретарём

description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

description.pt-br: Depois de postar um “Melhor Comentário”, de alguma forma eu me tornei o personagem principal de uma webtoon!

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

altTitles.ja: ト或ル夫婦ノ日乗

altTitles.en: Daily Life of a Certain Married Couple

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày của cặp đôi mới cưới

description.en: Kinu-san, a girl who's come to the Fujidana family as a bride, thinks of her husband as a man who lazes around everyday, but as she gets to know him she starts to think "My Husband has a bigger heart than I thought"
description.ja:
時は大正期――

藤棚家にお嫁にやってきた少女・いぬさんは、文筆家の夫・遥さんとひとつ屋根の下で暮らしています。初めて顔を合わせた祝言の日にも床下に閉じこもるような夫の極端な人見知りに戸惑うこともしばしばですが、一方で西国出身には珍しい「雪」や「富士の山」といった、うつくしい景色を見せてもらう生活を続けるうちに、存外に懐の広い夫だと思うようになったのです。
description.vi: Nàng dâu mang tên Kinu đến sống cùng gia đình nhà chồng Fujidana. Thoạt đầu nhìn chồng là một người nhút nhát, lười biếng, nhưng cô đã bắt đầu tìm hiểu và biết rằng "chồng mình có trái tim rộng lượng hơn mình nghĩ".
